hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select ta.ID_,ta.CID_,ta.CDATE_,ta.MID_,ta.MDATE_,ta.UUID_, ta.cate,ta.title,ta.ispicnews,ta.status_,ta.times,tb.value from core_news ta left join core_basicdata tb on tb.value2 = ta.cate and tb.name='news'

select ta.ID_,ta.CDATE_,ta.UUID_,ta.title from core_news ta left join core_basicdata tb on tb.value2 = ta.cate and tb.name='news' where ta.status_ = 1 and ta.cate = :cate order by ta.CDATE_ desc limit 10
select ifnull((select value from core_basicdata where value2 = :cate and name='news'),"") from dual
select count(*) as ds from core_news

select ta.ID_,ta.CID_,ta.CDATE_,ta.MID_,ta.MDATE_,ta.UUID_, ta.cate,ta.title,ta.content,ta.ispicnews,ta.status_,ta.times,tb.displayName,tc.value from core_news ta left join core_user tb on tb.ID_ = ta.CID_ left join core_basicdata tc on tc.name='news' and tc.value2 = ta.cate where ta.ID_ = :id
update core_news set MID_ = :mId, MDATE_ = sysdate(), cate = :cate, title = :title, content = :content, ispicnews = :ispicnews, keywords = :keywords, imgurl = :imgurl where ID_ = :id
update core_news set MID_ = :mId, MDATE_ = sysdate(), status_ = :status where ID_ = :id
update core_news set times = times + 1 where ID_ = :id and status_ = 1
select ta.ID_,ta.title,ta.UUID_,ta.imgurl from core_news ta where ta.ispicnews = 'Y' and ta.status_ = 1 and ta.imgurl is not null order by ta.CDATE_ desc limit 5
select ifnull((select count(*) from core_news ta where ta.ispicnews = 'Y' and ta.status_ = 1 and ta.imgurl is not null),0) from dual
